criteria: Understanding of Mexican Settlements and Locations
descriptions: Student demonstrates no understanding of Mexican settlements or their locations.

Student demonstrates a strong understanding of the locations and significance of multiple Mexican settlements, including some lesser-known ones.
Student provides a comprehensive and detailed overview of Mexican settlements, their precise locations, and their strategic importance in the region.
